thread.title: TV | Unreported World

author: Fiona Flynn
title: TV | Unreported World
text: This award-winning current affairs show returns for a new series which tonight see the team in China where Shaunagh Connaire reveals how some hospitals in China are using treatments involving nausea-inducing drugs and electric shock therapy in the belief they will 'cure' gay people, despite the fact that it is almost 15 years since the Chinese Psychiatric Association stopped classifying homosexuality as a mental illness. Dark but necessary viewing with a team that have no fear of showing the truth about what's really going on in the world we live in.
